channel.title: Knight - died on my first successful guard
channel.description:
Night 1 You will guard Kingcake [15] tonight. You watched over Kingcake [15].
Night 2 You will guard Hair [2] tonight. You watched over Hair [2]. You killed someone while guarding Hair [2] last night. You died guarding Hair [2] last night.
The player I killed claimed to have been possessed to kill 2, so maybe if possessor sends a BD at a guarded player, it bypasses the "Armored" passive?

item.title: Knight - died on my first successful guard
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
I’ve done this, in my case I killed 2 people in one night, which is probably what happened for you.

In my case I killed the Assassin and Possessor attempting to jump in the same night.

The messages are independent kills.

“You killed someone while guarding X last night.” = kill that you survived because of Armored
“You died guarding X last night.” = kill that you didn’t survive.

Normally you don’t see both messages at the same time. Normally you’d only see one of them.
